about_the_game:
In his debut album, Bharat Nag brings you the Soundtrack of Switch - Or Die Trying.

Track List


01. Change (1:41)
02. Ifs & Buts (3:49)
03. Gear Up (5:22)
04. Bone Crusher (5:35)
05. Mommy's Rock Show (5:33)
06. Frontline (5:44)
